title: Blue Essence/Urfwick Error
body:
Finished the season with 130k blue essence, after disenchanting a bunch of shards and leveling up, I finally hit 150k BE ... unfortunately It says I don't have enough.

https://imgur.com/a/kJLBG

You clearly see I have 150k BE, but urfwick highlighted says I don't have enough.

Help? am I missing something?

replies.body:
Ah okay, thanks for the help.. submitted a ticket earlier today before you responded. 
Cheers~

Ahhhhh so this might be a considered a small visual bug maybe, but that value is actually rounding up for some reason. I double checked your account, and right now you're sitting at 149547 BE. I know it's a short amount off, but hopefully you've got enough champ shards or are able to level up quick enough to buy that skin!
